titles: An answer according to truth that trembles not, nor quakes, nor quayleth : given to thirty six queries, propounded by James Parnell (commonly called the Young Quaker) to an ancient countrey-minister : with some counter-qu√¶ries returned by the same minister unto the said young Quack and his fellowes.
